column1: Friends will be received on Wednesday from 2-4
column2: 6-8 PM in the Cicholski-Zidek Funeral Home
column4: where a blessing service will be held on Thursday at 9:30 AM. Mass of Christian Burial will follow at 10 AM in Most Blessed Sacrament Church with his pastor the Rev. James Mazurek as celebrant. Burial will be in Mt. Airy Cemetery
